context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

after.description: Limit response to posts published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

modified_after.description: Limit response to posts modified after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

before.description: Limit response to posts published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

modified_before.description: Limit response to posts modified before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific IDs.

search_semantics.description: How to interpret the search input.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

search_columns.description: Array of column names to be searched.

slug.description: Limit result set to posts with one or more specific slugs.

status.description: Limit result set to posts assigned one or more statuses.

tax_relation.description: Limit result set based on relationship between multiple taxonomies.

wp_pattern_category.description: Limit result set to items with specific terms assigned in the wp_pattern_category taxonomy.

oneOf.title: Term ID List
oneOf.description: Match terms with the listed IDs.

operator.description: Whether items must be assigned all or any of the specified terms.

wp_pattern_category_exclude.description: Limit result set to items except those with specific terms assigned in the wp_pattern_category taxonomy.

oneOf.title: Term ID List
oneOf.description: Match terms with the listed IDs.

date.description: The date the post was published, in the site's timezone.

date_gmt.description: The date the post was published, as GMT.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the post unique to its type.

status.description: A named status for the post.

password.description: A password to protect access to the content and excerpt.

raw.description: Title for the post, as it exists in the database.
Content for the post, as it exists in the database.

block_version.description: Version of the content block format used by the post.

protected.description: Whether the content is protected with a password.

raw.description: Excerpt for the post, as it exists in the database.

rendered.description: HTML excerpt for the post, transformed for display.

protected.description: Whether the excerpt is protected with a password.

template.description: The theme file to use to display the post.

wp_pattern_category.description: The terms assigned to the post in the wp_pattern_category taxonomy.
